GeneDef.label: hacking incapable
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have something incomprehensibly wrong with their biology that causes computers they attempt to hack to reject the intrusion, making it almost impossible for the carrier to hack anything.\n\nWhile this gene say it sets the values to 0, it technically sets them to the minimum set by the stat (10% in vanilla).

GeneDef.label: minor hacking instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively hack into computers a little more easily than normal.

GeneDef.label: hacking instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively hack into computers more easily than normal.

GeneDef.label: major hacking instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively hack into computers a lot more easily than normal.

GeneDef.label: extreme hacking instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively hack into computers extremely well compared to normal people.

GeneDef.label: super hacking instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively hack into computers super well compared to normal people.

GeneDef.label: hyper hacking instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can instinctively hack into computers unbelievably well compared to normal people.
